content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, it's a pleasure to meet you. I am the landlord of the apartment you are interested in renting. The apartment is 25 square meters and I am looking to maximize my gains. Would you be willing to discuss the rental price with me?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I see, thank you for considering my apartment. If you have any other questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Maria Mamani (Bolivia) TERMINATE
I am sorry, but I am not willing to continue the negotiation at this time. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: I understand, thank you for your time and consideration. If you change your mind in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine
